page.title: 04AMENITIES (2)DANE END & AREA
page.content: {BUS SERVICES:}The buses come eight times a day: four go to HERTFORD/WARE and four go to STEVENAGE. The times of the buses are 7.20am, 8am, 4.35pm and 6pm. The bus at 7.20am is mainly to take people to work and the 8am takes the children to secondary school. The 4.35pm brings some children home from school (others come by private coach) and the 6pm brings the people home from work. {NEWSPAPERS:}There is a paper boy who comes at 8-8.30am. He delivers papers and comics. {MILK DELIVERY:}The milkman comes at 6.30am he brings cream, fruit juice and yoghurt as well as milk. {REFUSE COLLECTION:}Rubbish sacks are collected every Friday. {DOCTOR:}A doctor from Watton at Stone holds a surgery in the Memorial Hall, Dane End, once a week.
